actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for a 6-year term for the appointment of the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

summary.text: Provides for a six-year term for the appointment of the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 532nt)

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for a 6-year term for the appointment of the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
